x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Youth and students are increasingly exposed to unverified information and deepfakes online, but schools lack scalable, engaging tools to teach critical digital literacy skills. This leads to poor academic research skills, increased social polarization, and vulnerability to online scams, posing a long-term risk to civic health.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The solution would use a Learning Management System (LMS) structure built on the ServiceNow Platform.

It would incorporate:

  • App Engine Studio & UI Builder: To create a gamified, mobile-first learning experience with interactive modules (quizzes, simulations).
  • HR Service Delivery (Learning): To manage course enrollment, track progress, and issue verifiable digital certificates upon completion.
  • Now Assist (GenAI): To provide a secure, sandbox environment where students can test and analyze suspicious headlines or content without real-world risk.
  • Performance Analytics: To provide educators with dashboards to track the most common types of misinformation encountered and student comprehension rates.
